      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Point.dist(Point p)
      Given a point, computes the distance between the current point and the given point.
      boolean Point.equal(Point p)
      Given a point, checks if the points are the same point with a precision of 0.0001.
      boolean Point.isAbove(Point p)
      Given a point, checks if the current Point is above it.

      Given a point, checks if the current Point is below it.

      Constructors in geometry with parameters of type Point 
      Constructor and Description
      Arc(Point center, Point start, Point end)
      Initializes the Arc with three points and a radius, this radius is a characteristic of the arc used to compute the Arc length.
      LineSegment(Point a, Point b)
      The creation of a valid LineSegment implies that the start and end points must be different, or else we would only have one simple point.
